articles.title: 29th Mangyongdae Prize Int'l Marathon Held
articles.content:
29th Mangyongdae Prize Int'l Marathon Held
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The 29th Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon was held here to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Marathoners from the DPRK, China, Morocco, Zimbabwe, Kenya, Ethiopia and Uganda and many amateurs from various countries and regions competed in marathon, half marathon, 10 km and 5 km races.
					
					 Its opening ceremony took place at the Kim Il Sung Stadium on Sunday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee, Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho, Pak Hun, minister of Construction and Building-Materials Industry who is chairman of the DPRK Marathon Association, officials concerned, Pyongyangites and foreign guests.
					
					 An opening address was made and the games began.
					
					 Citizens from all walks of life, youths and students cheered the players along the courses.
					
					 Men and women players of the DPRK won gold, silver and bronze medals in the marathon and half-marathon.
					
					 In the marathon of amateurs, the first place was taken by Tibbs Hugh Samuel (man) of Britain and Andersen Stine Laura Muldbak (woman) of Denmark, the second place by Sven Thelin (man) of Sweden and Tai Hsiheng (woman) of China's Taipei, and the third place by Kelly Daniel Patrick (man) of Britain and Dideriksen Line Rejkjaer (woman) of Denmark.
					
					 At the closing ceremony after the games, cups, medals, diplomas and certificates were awarded to the successful runners and amateurs.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Meet to Praise Virtues of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Meet to Praise Virtues of Kim Jong Il
 Sariwon, April 8 (KCNA) -- A presentation of virtues was given by agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea at the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province Sunday to mark the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Kim Chang Yop, chairman of the UAWK Central Committee, officials concerned and officials of the Union and agricultural workers in Sariwon City.
					
					 The performers said that every socialist farmland is associated with the patriotic footprints of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They noted that in the new century he visited the Migok Co-op Farm several times and helped it acquire an excellent view as a farm under socialism, saying it is a farm dear to him.
					
					 They also said that he left his patriotic footprints at the Hamhung Vegetable Farm, working heart and soul to supply the people with fresh vegetables the year round.
					
					 The great change in this farm is a result of the great efforts and loving care shown by Kim Jong Il who made his lifelong dedication to the improvement of the people's livelihood, they added.
					
					 The Kusong Namsan Stockbreeding Co-op Farm, too, turned into a modern stockbreeding base under the guidance of Kim Jong Il who visited it and indicated the way for the development of stockbreeding, the performers stressed.
					
					 And they noted that he gave instructions to develop the country's fruit farming under the banner of scientific fruit culture during his visit to the Ryongjon Fruit Farm in Pukchong County in May Juche 100(2011).
					
					 The performers called for making a rich harvest on the socialist land, regarding his behests as lifeline.

articles.title: Stamp Exhibition Celebrates Day of Sun
articles.content:
Stamp Exhibition Celebrates Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A collection of Korean stamps were displayed at the Korean Stamp Exhibition House on Sunday in celebration of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display there is a photo showing the stamp carrying pictures of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Hundreds of stamps exhibited under the theme of "The Sun of Juche" help the visitors look back upon the revolutionary life of the President.
					
					 Some of them reflect his exploits and noble virtue and his external activities.
					
					 The stamp exhibition will last until April 17.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued a new stamp (sheetlet) to mark the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 At the center of the stamp there is a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il, eternal chairman of the NDC.
					
					 Written on its upper part are letters reading "The most profound respect and eternal glory to the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il". And a picture symbolic of the glory, dignity and invincible military might of the DPRK is depicted on its lower part.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Deserves Heavy Penalty: S. Korean Body
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Deserves Heavy Penalty: S. Korean Body
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea reportedly released a commentary on Friday.
					 The commentary recalled that traitor Park Geun Hye was sentenced to 24 years in prison and was fined 18 billion won at the first trial hearing on her scandal.
					
					 Park should pay dearly for having abused her power in her administration of "state affairs" and perpetrated high-profile graft, it said, adding: Park deserves heavy penalty as she has never reflected on her crimes but denied them and refused to stand trial.
					
					 The commentary said the organization will carry on its struggle until Park and other criminals involved in the scandal are given deserved punishment.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Germany
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Azzawi Media Print Publishing House in Berlin brought out in booklet President Kim Il Sung's work "Enhancing the Role of the Popular Masses Is the Guarantee for Victory in the Cause of Independence" on March 28 on the occasion of his birth anniversary, the Day of the Sun.
					 The work, published on April 15, Juche 81 (1992), says that  80 years of the President's life is that of struggle in which he devoted himself to the people as their son. It also clarifies that the Workers' Party of Korea has firmly maintained the Juche stand and principle, always regarding the Juche idea as its guidelines in the whole course of the revolution and construction, and that the common task facing the Koreans and the world people is to build an independent new world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Successful Visit to China Hailed in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Successful Visit to China Hailed in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Mostafa Jamal Haider, secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, issued a statement on April 2 in congratulation of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's successful visit to China.
					 The statement said:
					
					 News of HE Kim Jong Un's visit to China has aroused great sensation in the world.
					
					 His visit is of important significance in adding shine to the long-standing tradition of the DPRK-China friendship and carrying forward and developing the bilateral relations generation after generation.
					
					 In particular, his visit was made at a time when the situation on the Korean peninsula was undergoing a sudden change, a clear indication to the importance of the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 Convinced that the two parties and peoples of the DPRK and China will creditably accomplish the cause common to them, we warmly congratulate HE Kim Jong Un upon his successful China visit.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in DR Congo
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in DR Congo
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The DR Congolese preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, issued a bulletin on March 25.
					 The bulletin carried articles titled "Africa does not forget", "Selfless material and moral assistance" and others under the headline of "On the occasion of the 106th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung".
					
					 It introduced in detail the facts that Kim Il Sung rendered material and moral support and assistance to the African peoples' national-liberation struggle and building of a new society, noting that he has been boundlessly revered by the world progressives for his enormous contribution to the human cause of independence.
					
					 In Africa at that time a word that it is needed to certainly meet with Comrade Kim Il Sung in order to make revolution was in vogue in the continent, the bulletin said, stressing that a lot of edifices were built in all parts of Africa thanks to his selfless support and cooperation.

articles.title: Anniversary of Popular Uprising on Jeju Island Observed in Britain
articles.content:
Anniversary of Popular Uprising on Jeju Island Observed in Britain
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, Korean Friendship Association UK and the British Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification of the Korean Peninsula issued a joint statement on March 28 with the approach of the 70th anniversary of the April 3 Popular Uprising on Jeju Island.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Popular Uprising on Jeju Island in April 1948 was recorded as a shining page in the history of the south Korean people's anti-U.S., anti-fascist struggle.
					
					 The uprisers fought to oppose the U.S. imperialists' colonial enslavement policy and moves for dividing the Korean nation and realize the country's reunification.
					
					 The uprising showed what the true nature of "liberty" and "democracy" touted by the U.S. imperialists is.
					
					 It also left a bitter lesson that the U.S. imperialists are, indeed, murderers with whom a human being can no longer live together and it is necessary to fight it out against them.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists should make a due apology for having mercilessly killed the uprisers and pull their troops out of south Korea without delay.
					
					 The soul of the uprisers is still alive.

articles.title: Tiene lugar el 29o Torneo Internacional de Maraton por el Premio Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Tiene lugar el 29o Torneo Internacional de Maraton por el Premio Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, tuvo lugar en esta capital el 29o Torneo Internacional de Maraton por el Premio Mangyongdae.
					En el presente certamen dividido en el maraton, semimaraton y las carreras de 10 km y 5km, participaron muchos atletas de Corea, China, Marruecos, Zimbabwe, Kenia, Etiopia y Uganda y numerosos aficionados provenientes de varios paises y regiones.
					
					La ceremonia de apertura tuvo lugar el dia 8 en el Estadio Kim Il Sung con la participacion del vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, Choe Hwi, el vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho, el ministro de Construccion e Industria de Materiales de Construccion y presidente de la Asociacion de Maratonistas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Hun, los funcionarios interesados, los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					En la ocasion hubo el discurso inaugural y se efectuo la competencia.
					
					Los maratonistas de ambos sexos y los amateurs corrieron con toda su fuerza y les dieron animo en las calles los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos.
					
					En la competencia de maraton y semimaraton los atletas de ambos sexos de Corea ganaron las medallas de oro, plata y bronce. 
					
					En la competencia de los amateurs Tibbs Hugh Samuel (m) de Gran Bretana y Andersen Stine Laura Muldbak (f) de Dinamarca ocuparon el primer lugar; Sven Thelin (m) de Suecia y Tai Hsiheng (f) de Taipei de China, el Segundo lugar, asi como Kelly Daniel Patrick (m) de Gran Bretana y Dideriksen Line Rejkjaer (f) de Dinamarca, el tercer lugar.
					
					En la ceremonia de clausura fueron otorgados las copas, medallas, diplomas y certificados a los jugadores y aficionados sobresalientes.

articles.title: Tiene lugar el acto de presentacion sobre nobles virtudes de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tiene lugar el acto de presentacion sobre nobles virtudes de Kim Jong Il
Sariwon, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la Granja Cooperativa de Migok de la ciudad de Sariwon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte el acto de presentacion de los trabajadores agricolas e integrantes de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea sobre nobles virtudes del Dirigente con motivo del 25o aniversario de su eleccion como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el presidente del Comite Central de la UTAC, Kim Chang Yop, los funcionarios interesados y los funcionarios y trabajadores agricolas de la UTAC en la ciudad de Sariwon.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que las huellas patrioticas y abnegadas del Dirigente estan impregnadas por doquier de los campos rurales socialistas. 
					
					Recordaron que en el nuevo siglo el lider antecesor visito en varias ocasiones la Granja Cooperativa de Migok y la convirtio en el modelo del campo socialista. 
					
					Dijeron que el realizo tambien la visita de orientacion a la Granja Especializada en Verduras de Hamhung para ofrecer a los habitantes las verduras frescas en todas las estaciones. 
					
					Enfatizaron que la transformacion de esta granja es el fruto del amor y esfuerzos del Dirigente quien dedico toda su vida por el mejoramiento de las condiciones de vida del pueblo. 
					
					Mencionaron que gracias al Dirigente quien ilumino en el terreno el rumbo para el desarrollo de la ganaderia, se ha convertido en una moderna base ganadera la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Ganaderia de Namsan de Kusong. 
					
					Se refirieron a que en mayo del 100 (2011) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente visito la Granja Fruticola de Ryongjon del distrito de Pukchong y dio las instrucciones de desarrollar la fruticultura del pais de manera cientifica. 
					
					Insistieron en recoger buena cosecha manteniendo como linea de vida el legado del Dirigente.

articles.title: Exhibidos sellos coreanos en homenaje al Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Exhibidos sellos coreanos en homenaje al Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, quedaron exhibidos el dia 8 muchos sellos coreanos en la Exposicion Permanente de Sellos de Corea.
					En la sede de la galeria filatelica se ven las fotos alusivas a los sellos con imagenes sonrientes del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Cientos de sellos exhibidos bajo el tema de "Sol del Juche" hacen recordar la vida revolucionaria del Presidente.
					
					Se distinguen los sellos que reflejan las proezas y nobles rasgos del Presidente y sus actividades exteriores. 
					
					La exhibicion filatelica continuara hasta el dia 17.

articles.title: Emitido sello dedicado al dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente de CDN
articles.content:
Emitido sello dedicado al dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente de CDN
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- La Direccion Estatal de Sellos de Corea emitio un nuevo sello en papel enterizo de pequeno tamano con motivo del 25o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En la parte central del sello se ve la imagen con amplia sonrisa del eterno Presidente del CDN de la RPDC.
					
					En la parte superior se ven las inscripciones "Rendimos el mas sublime tributo y eterna gloria al gran Dirigente Kim Jong Il" y en la parte inferior esta un dibujo que simboliza el honor, la dignidad y el invencible poderio militar de la RPDC.
